scripts.extension: next build && next export -o extension/html && mv extension/html/_next extension/html/next && cp extension/manifest.json extension/html && sed -i '' -e 's/\/_next/\/next/g' extension/html/*.html && sed -i '' -e 's/\/_next/\/next/g' extension/html/next/static/chunks/*.js
scripts.pkg: yarn extension && web-ext build --overwrite-dest && rm -rf extension/html
